info_points.title: Hun Kal Crater
info_points.description: Hun Kal is a small crater on Mercury used as a reference point it's prime meridian. It is defined as being at longitude 20Â°W of the planet's prime meridian.

info_points.title: Caloris Plantia
info_points.description: Caloris Plantia is a very large impact basin on Mercury. It is one of the largest impact basins in the Solar System.
